description: My honours project was to create a suite of accessible mobile games for the visually impaired. I achieved this by utilising a screen reader and simple screen gestures. The suite of mobile games included Snakes and Ladders, Battleships, Cluedo, Mastermind and a Tamagotchi.
subjects: Advanced Algorithms |Software Construction | Software Verification and Analysis | Computer Vision | Computing and Society | Princicples of Data Science.

description: Double major in Computer Science and Operations Research, with a minor in Applied Maths.
subjects: Computer Science: Software Engineering, Concurrency, Networks, Web Development | Operations Research: Decision modelling, Network Optimisation, Nonlinear Optimisation, Linear Programming | Applied Maths: Numerical Methods, Flow Modelling.

degree: BSc: Chemical Biology (Incomplete, change of career direction)
